title: Task 1: Describe visual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe one architectural element of the Palazzo Rucellai.
Response accurately describes one architectural element of the Palazzo Rucellai.
Response accurately describes two architectural elements of the Palazzo Rucellai.

title: Task 2: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific visual evidence to explain how Alberti references earlier architectural traditions in the Palazzo Rucellai.
Response does accurately use specific visual evidence to explain how Alberti references earlier architectural traditions in the Palazzo Rucellai.

title: Task 3: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific visual evidence to explain how Alberti departs from earlier architectural traditions in the Palazzo Rucellai.
Response does accurately use specific visual evidence to explain how Alberti departs from earlier architectural traditions in the Palazzo Rucellai.

title: Task 4: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or group of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use contextual evidence to explain how Alberti’s references to earlier architectural traditions express the ideals of the Italian Renaissance.
Response does accurately use specific contextual evidence to explain how Alberti’s references to earlier architectural traditions express the ideals of the Italian Renaissance.
